name: Hide And Seek (itch) (NotPomsky)
description:
Keep In Mind That This Is An Old Top Down Hide And Seek Game I Made A Very Long Time Ago So Its Rlly Bad

-----------------------------------------------------------------

⏳Welcome To Hide And Seek⏳

    ⏳REVAMP Update [v1.3]⏳

-----------------------------------------------------------------

⦿ WASD Or Arrow Keys To Move

⦿ Space To Hide Yourself

⦿ Run And Hide From The Seeker!

⦿ Timer Only Goes If You Are Hidden!

⦿ Try To Stay Hidden As Long As Possible!

⦿ Post Your Time In Comments!

⦿ Good Luck And Have Fun Playing!
